name: Provisional Junior Research Fellowships & Research Associates
Walk-in interview for Junior Research Fellows (JRF)

details.fellowship details: The fellowship position for which applications are invited is as under: SL No. 1 Type of fellowships | Number of fellowships | Essential Qualification Maximum Age | Date of fellowship Fellow (JRF) Junior Essential Qualification Post graduate degree in Science in first division with NET qualification or Graduate degree in engineering (B.E/B.Tech) in first division with valid GATE score (Tuesday), or Post graduate degree in engineering (M.E/M. Tech) in first division both at Graduate and Post graduate level.
details.tenure details: The tenure of fellowship is initially for 02 years, can be upgraded and extended up to a period of 05 years subject to satisfactory performance as per DRDO instructions.
details.eligibility criteria: Only those candidates who have been awarded degree/provisional certificate are eligible to apply.
details.application process: Application Form can be downloaded from the DRDO website www.drdo.gov.in. Duly filled Application Form is to be forwarded to director.itm@gov.in.

name: Walk-in-Interview for Junior Research Fellow (JRF) and Research Assoicate

details.Notification Date: Results of walk-in-interview conducted at DRDE, Gwalior on 18.02.2025 and 19.02.2025 for JRF & RA are as under
List of Waitlisted Candidates: Dr. Kapuganti Ramani Shyam Dr. Shweta Raj

details.Eligibility Criteria: Please refer to the advertisement for details.
details.Duration of Fellowship: The fellowship is for a period of one year, renewable for two more years based on performance.
details.Stipend: A stipend of Rs. 25000/- per month will be paid to the selected candidate(s).
details.Benefits: Other benefits such as accommodation, conveyance, etc., may be provided subject to availability of funds.
